faqs.question: How long does shipping take?
faqs.answer:
We offer multiple shipping options to meet your needs:

• Standard shipping: 5-7 business days (Free on orders over $50)
• Express shipping: 2-3 business days ($9.99)
• Next-day delivery: 1 business day ($19.99, available in select areas)

All orders are processed within 24 hours on business days. You'll receive a tracking number via email once your order ships.

faqs.question: What is your return policy?
faqs.answer:
We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase! Here's our return policy:

• 30-day return window from delivery date
• Items must be unused and in original packaging
• Free returns for defective or wrong items
• Return shipping costs $5.99 for size/color exchanges
• Refunds processed within 3-5 business days after we receive your return

Simply contact our support team or use our easy online return portal to get started.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer:
We accept all major payment methods for your convenience:

• Credit Cards: Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover
• Digital Wallets: PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay
• Buy Now, Pay Later: Klarna, Afterpay (for orders over $35)
• Gift Cards: Shop This gift cards and store credit

All transactions are secured with 256-bit SSL encryption to protect your personal and payment information.

faqs.question: How can I track my order?
faqs.answer:
Tracking your order is easy! Here are three ways:

• Email: Check your confirmation email for the tracking link
• Account Dashboard: Log into your account and view 'My Orders'
• Text Updates: Reply 'TRACK' to our SMS notifications

Your tracking number becomes active within 24 hours of shipping. If you can't find your tracking information, contact our support team at support@shopthis.com or call 1-800-SHOP-NOW.
